attributes.action: ignore people that are petitioning against ID cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many of us that understand the need for restrictions such as ID cards as an attempt to reduce the crime rates within our country.  We urge the Prime Minister to ignore these potential criminals that are against these cards and carry on with his job!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
